episodes.title: Inside the Zizians, a radical California-based cult linked to 6 violent deaths
episodes.description:
The Zizians, a cultlike group that spun off of the Berkeley-based rationalist movement, have now been tied to 6 violent deaths, including that of a Border Patrol officer in Vermont.

Read full story HERE: https://www.bostonglobe.com/2025/02/11/metro/6-violent-deaths-tied-to-radical-vegan-cult-based-in-california/?p1=HP_Feed_Recommended/?s_campaign=videolink:youtube
